sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_funds_transaction_stages">
    <x_snc_nnemc0_funds_transaction_stages action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <fund_stage_description>An administrative reservation of funds based on procurement directives,
requests, or equivalent instruments that authorize preliminary negotiations, but require
that funds be certified by the official responsible for the administrative control of funds
before incurrence of the obligation. Initiations are entered into memorandum accounts to
help keep pre-commitment actions, such as approved procurement programs, within the
available subdivision of funds. Initiations identify funds to be set aside for planning
purposes before establishment of commitments or obligations. Initiations will not be
maintained as a part of the official fiscal records.</fund_stage_description>
        <fund_stage_name>Initiation</fund_stage_name>
        <number>FUNDSTAGE0001001</number>
        <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_funds_transaction_stages</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-10-24 15:14:57</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0d31371edb1d23008e9357935e9619c0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-10-24 15:14:57</sys_updated_on>
    </x_snc_nnemc0_funds_transaction_stages>
</record_update>
